title: SERRAL vs CLEM: StarCraft 2 Game of the Year!
excerpt: Amazing game of StarCraft 2 between Clem (Terran) and Serral (Zerg). When it comes to Zerg versus Terran it really doesn't get better than these two pro gamers facing off against each other.
